Hello, I\'m duckunlimited2

I\'ve been playing KSP for a few months now and I think its a great game with so much potential. I\'ve been reading the forums for a few months as well, but never got around to joining the community until now.

So, I look forward to sharing my KSP experiences with you

ducky
